drawing_instructions.thinking: Since I'm feeling happy, I want to start by drawing a cheerful sun in the upper right corner! The sun always brings joy and positive energy. I'll use the wiggle brush with a bright jasmine yellow to create playful, wavy rays emanating from a circular center. This will set a cheerful tone for the entire composition. I'll position it high enough to leave space for more happy elements below.

I see a cheerful wiggly sun in the upper right! To continue the happy mood, I want to draw some playful flowers sprouting from the bottom of the canvas. I'll start with a curved stem using the marker brush in a fresh Keppel green. This will create a sense of growth and life, positioning it on the left side to balance the sun. The gentle curve suggests movement and dance-like joy.

I notice a bright sun and a single curved stem - let's make this scene even happier by adding more flower stems! Since we have one gentle curve, I'll draw another playful stem next to it with a similar dancing motion but slightly different curve to create a sense of joyful movement. Using the same fresh Keppel green to maintain harmony, I'll position this new stem a bit to the right of the first one, creating a natural garden feel.

Looking at our cheerful scene with the wiggly sun and two graceful stems, let's add some joyful flower petals at the top of each stem! I'll use the crayon brush with a bright Tea Rose color to create soft, round petals - this will make our flowers look happy and playful. I'll start with the flower head on the left stem, making it full and bouncy to express pure joy. The textured crayon effect will give it a lovely, playful feeling.

Looking at our joyful garden scene with the wiggly sun and one blooming flower, I want to complete the second flower to create a balanced, happy pair! I'll use the crayon brush with the same Tea Rose color to draw soft, fluffy petals around the top of the right stem. I'll position these petals slightly differently from the first flower to give each bloom its own cheerful personality, like they're dancing together under the sunny sky!

Looking at our cheerful garden scene with the sun and two lovely flowers, I want to add more playful sun rays to make the sun even more joyful and energetic! I'll add some additional wiggly rays in a different direction to create a sense of warmth and radiance spreading across the sky. The wiggle brush with bright Jasmine yellow will create perfect playful, dancing rays that express pure happiness!

Looking at our delightful scene with the wiggly sun and two happy flowers, I want to add some playful butterflies dancing around the flowers! To express pure joy, I'll use the wiggle brush with a lovely Wisteria purple to create a fluttering butterfly between the flowers. The wiggling lines will make it look like it's dancing in the air, adding more movement and happiness to our cheerful garden!

Our garden scene is so cheerful with its dancing flowers, wiggly sun, and fluttering butterfly! To add even more joy and playfulness, I'll draw another happy butterfly in a different position, this time near the top flower on the right. Using the wiggle brush with the same Wisteria purple, I'll create a butterfly that appears to be twirling upward in a spiral of happiness, making our garden feel even more alive with movement and joy!

Our cheerful garden scene has lovely flowers, butterflies, and a radiant sun! To add more joyful energy, I want to create another butterfly that seems to be spiraling higher into the sky - like it's dancing with pure happiness! I'll position this one a bit higher up between our existing butterflies, using the wiggle brush with Wisteria purple to create flowing, playful movements that express carefree joy and freedom.

Our joyful garden scene is blossoming with happiness! To add even more whimsy and cheer, I want to create a playful breeze effect that makes everything feel like it's dancing. I'll use the wiggle brush with Sky Blue to draw some gentle, swirling wind curves that weave between our flowers and butterflies. This will add a sense of movement and lightness to the whole composition, making it feel like a perfect sunny day with a refreshing breeze!

Looking at our joyful garden scene with its dancing flowers, butterflies, and breezy elements, I want to add more playful energy to the sun! I'll create additional wiggly rays extending from the sun in a spiral pattern, using the wiggle brush with bright Jasmine yellow. This will make the sun look like it's radiating pure joy and warmth across our happy garden, creating a sense of boundless happiness spreading in all directions!

Our joyful garden scene is coming along beautifully! To add more whimsical energy and celebrate the happiness in the air, I want to add some delicate flower petals being carried by our playful breeze. I'll use the wiggle brush with Tea Rose color to create small, dancing petals floating between our flowers and butterflies, suggesting a magical moment where nature itself is expressing pure joy. These floating petals will connect all the elements in our scene with a sense of gentle movement and delight.

Looking at our delightful garden scene with its dancing flowers, butterflies, floating petals, and radiant sun, I want to add more joyful energy with another set of swirling wind patterns! I'll create a complementary breeze curve above our existing one, using the Sky Blue wiggle brush to suggest a gentle, happy breeze making everything dance. This will add another layer of cheerful movement to our whimsical scene, connecting the ground elements to the bright sun above!

Looking at our vibrant garden scene full of joyful elements, I want to add more playful sunbeams extending from our happy sun! The current rays are so energetic, but adding more wiggly rays in a different direction will make the sun feel even more radiant and celebratory. I'll use the wiggle brush with bright Jasmine yellow to create dancing rays that spiral outward in a new pattern, expressing pure joy radiating across our magical garden scene!

Our garden scene is so full of joy and movement! To amplify the happiness, I want to add a small cluster of cheerful flowers near the right side of our scene. I'll use the wiggle brush with Keppel to create a few small, bouncing blooms that seem to be dancing with our butterflies and floating petals. This will add another layer of joyful energy to our whimsical garden, positioned perfectly to balance the composition at coordinates that complement our existing elements.
